Malawi FAM Charity Shield bụ asọmpi bọọlụ a na-eme kwa afọ na Malawi, na ego a na-enweta na ọrụ ebere.
Ọ bụ Malawi Football Association malitere asọmpi ahụ na 2016, iji dochie Malawi Charity Shield na Tutulane Charity Cup
Na mbụ, asọmpi n'etiti ìgwè anọ, a gbanwere ya na 2019 ka ọ bụrụ otu egwuregwu n'etiti ndị mmeri Malawi FAM Cup na ndị mmeri league nke Malawi Premier Division
A na-eme ihe omume ahụ na Machị ma ọ bụ Eprel nke afọ ọ bụla, mana emeghị ya na 2020 ma ọ bụ 2021 n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19. Nyasa Big Bullets FC enwetala ọta n'oge ọ bụla kemgbe e bidoro ya.
